channel.title: Vanar.io on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Vanar.io on Game6r

item.title: Starblast io
item.description: The open space simulator “Vanar io” belongs to the multiplayer survival shooting games. You will get a small ship at your disposal, you will be able to blow up other people’s objects, pumping and improving your aircraft at their expense. But be careful. Open space is fraught with many threats in the form of enemy asteroids, planets and other celestial bodies. There are only two options for interacting with them: keep at a safe distance or ruthlessly destroy.
